comments:
I first time try to use the scrapbook. I created a new scrapbook using

File->New->Other->Java Run/Debug->Scrapbook page

Then in the scrapbook source editor I entered a String
"HELLO" and marked it. Then I used the contextmenu Display (Ctrl-Shift-D).
A message comes up, Eclipse wants me to switch to the Debug perspective, 
what I did.

Then after the debug perspective was visible an error message comes up:

Evaluation failed: Internal error - unable to obtain an execution context

I don't know what it means, any idea? Any solution?

I updated my Eclipse using the update manager.
Currently I use the Eclipse version 3.0.2, M200409161125

Thanks for any help!

Created an attachment (id=26634)
Eclipse  log-file ZIP-compressed

The scrapbook launches a VM in debug mode, in which to perform the expression 
evaluation. The error message means the scrapbook was unable to launch the VM 
to the point required to perform the evaluation. What VM version is your 
scrapbook's project using? When the perspective changed, what did the stack 
trace in the debug view look like (can you attach a screen shot)?

It looks like your project may be corrupt - there are many messages in the log 
like this... is "AO" the project in which the scrapbook file is present?
